subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: A Mets fan has been sentenced to 15 days in jail and barred from the Mets’ ballpark for three years after pleading guilty to shining a high-powered flashlight at two players.
snippet: A Mets fan has been sentenced to 15 days in jail and barred from the Mets’ ballpark for three years after pleading guilty to shining a high-powered flashlight at two players.
